ygData.subject: Re: Skill 91 blacksmith needs info
ygData.msgSnippet: hell I think you would be better off making gorgets or bracers adn selling them for cost than practicing on skewers they cap at lvl 104 i believe
ygData.messageBody:
hell I think you would be better off making gorgets or bracers adn selling
them for cost than practicing on skewers

they cap at lvl 104 i believe

At 11:44 AM 6/14/99 MDT, you wrote:
>From: Software hound <softwarehound@...>
>
>Hi, I am a skill 91 blacksmith, I have been making and selling the lower
>lvl banded items since around skill 80. What I am wondering is what is a
>good practice mold to get my skill above 100? Will skewers allow me to go
>that high? If not I would like to find one that will. Money is not that
>big of a deal at the moment, I just think there has got to be a mold that
>uses bits not sheets that can get me above 100.
>
>Thanks,
>
>Grak the Troll Blacksmith
>Rodcet Nife
>
